title: PRI's The World: 01/20/2015
teaser: President Barack Obama speaks to Congress and the nation tonight. The World goes deep today into the foreign policy issues that the president is likely to raise in his State of the Union address: from ISIS and threats to national security, to the Administration's immigration policy and Cuba. The World newsroom will be live-tweeting global context to the State of the Union, using the hashtag #worldwatches.
